name: CHHapticEvent.EventType
desc: The types of audio and haptic event waveforms.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Initializes an event type from a raw string value.

items.name: static let audioContinuous: CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: An audio event with a looped waveform of arbitrary length.

items.name: static let audioCustom: CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: An audio event using a waveform that you supply.

items.name: static let hapticTransient: CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: A brief impulse occurring at a specific point in time, like the feedback from toggling a switch.

items.name: static let hapticContinuous: CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: A haptic event with a looped waveform of arbitrary length.
